Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigManager
    This class contains the configurations of our web-crawler Its a singleton class .
    ConfigParser
    This class provides methods which parse the configurations file content and will store them in key value pairs in a HashMap and provide that HashMap to the crawler environment
    CrawlEngine
    This class contains the main method which is the starting point of the program.
    DataCenter
    This class provides data structures to be used as a central data storage for links repositories.
    Link
    An Object of a class Link represent one url link in memory
    LinkValidator
    This class provides methods to check link validations The validations include : 1.
    PageFetcher
    This class provides methods for fetching a web-page's html text from server
    PageParser
    This class provides method to parse the HTML data to extract out all the links from that data
